text.div:
Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code

Code Description Deutsch (German) Comment Version
1 Service is subject to medical necessity procedures Zuzahlung muss abgeklärt werden added v2.3.1
2 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and agrees to pay for service added v2.3.1
3 Patient has been informed of responsibility, and asks that the payer be billed Patient fragt nach Rechnung added v2.3.1
4 Advanced Beneficiary Notice has not been signed Zustimmung zur Zuzahlung liegt nicht vor added v2.3.1

name: v2 Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0339 ( Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code)

concept.display: Service is subject to medical necessity procedures

designation.value: Zustimmung zur Zuzahlung liegt nicht vor
